About the Company: Setco Automotive Ltd is a premier manufacturer of clutch products for the Automotive and hydraulic products for Construction Equipment Industry. In addition Setco also manufactures precision engineering components like complex and deep drawn pressings and forgings and castings that are machined and heat treated.The product range of the company includes Construction Equipment Hydraulics - Pressure Converters for the Construction Equipment industry.Truck & Automotive- Clutch Systems for Medium and Heavy Commercial Vehicle Industry.Pressings: Deep Drawn and Complex utilizing upto 1000 tons.- Precision Components Machined & Heat Treated.
